extracted_playbook.title: Update SINEMA Remote Connect Client
extracted_playbook.description: Update to version V3.2 SP2 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as per Siemens' guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Protected IT Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Isolate Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
